snippet.title: Griftlands - E3 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
DEVELOPMENT UPDATE 10/29/2018: https://forums.kleientertainment.com/forums/topic/97736-griftlands-update/

Griftlands - Add to your Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/601840 In Griftlands, everything is negotiable: money, loyalty—even morality. Choose your character and make your fortune. Griftlands is the next game by Klei.

Subscribe for more details and future announcements. Follow us on twitter @klei (http://twitter.com/klei)
